title: The Cool-Girl Way How to Style Ugg Boots, According to Street Style Stars
description: Because yes, you can wear this winter staple and still look chic.
excerpt: Because yes, you can wear this winter staple and still look chic.
text: The holidays are right around the corner, which means it’s time to pull out of your favorite sherpa-lined Ugg boots. These iconic shoes took over in the 2000s and made the ultimate comeback just a few years ago, in 2022, with the release of the Bella Hadid-approved Classic Ultra Mini Platform (which just so happens to be my favorite, too).Yes, Ugg boots are known for their undeniable comfort, but can we talk about how cute they are, too? The silhouette makes them the perfect winter boot, keeping you cozy no matter what the elements bring. And with so many styles and colors to choose from, there’s no need to stop at just one pair—from boho ensembles to chic airport looks, the outfit possibilities are limitless. Not quite sure what I mean? I found 14 outstandingly chic (and incredibly wearable) looks from street style stars and celebrities, including Bella and Gigi Hadid, Jennifer Lopez, Emily Ratajkowski, and Selena Gomez, to provide you with ample Ugg boots outfit inspiration for your next cold-weather look. See and shop them all below.Trendsetting Basics getty images Running out of the house in your loungewear doesn’t have to be basic. (Of course, when it’s Bella Hadid wearing a look, it’s anything but basic, but I digress...) Whether you’re opting for the no-pants look or not, throw on your favorite sunnies, a leather jacket, and platform Uggs for a more stylish take on grabbing a sweet treat from the bodega or your favorite cafe. After all, iced lattes always taste better when you’re wearing a cute outfit. Prada Black Runway SunglassesNow 10% OffFree People Vinny Vegan BomberSkims Shrunken T-Shirt Alo Yoga Icon Ribbed BoyshortNow 32% OffAlo Yoga Unisex Scrunch SockNow 32% OffUgg Classic Ultra Mini Platform BootSherpa SeasonGetty ImagesThis is one of my favorite times of the year—when you can feel wrapped up but not overly so. A vest is the perfect option for this weather, and in shearling? Sign me up. Pair it was a classic pair of jeans and a patent leather bag à la Gigi Hadid, and you’re all set for just about anything. Gucci Oval-shaped SunglassesIsabel Marant Gwendalia Wool-Blend VestNow 30% OffRalph Lauren Relaxed Fit Striped Cotton ShirtNow 16% OffLevi’s Ribcage Full LengthUgg Tazz Platform SlipperVersace Croc-Effect Medusa ’95 Small HandbagCheetah Girl getty imagesIn my opinion, animal prints like leopard and cheetah prints are a sartorial neutral. I own this exact pair of pants and can confidently say they’re part of my weekly rotation. The beauty of these is that you don’t need much else to make them look chic. Add an oversized bomber jacket, sunnies, and, of course, your favorite style of Uggs, and you have yourself a cute and comfortable fall ’fit.Otra Quinn SunglassesAcne Studios Bomber JacketCourrèges Black Holistic Tank TopGrey Bandit Tyler PantsVivienne Westwood Large Hazel HandbagUgg Classic Ultra Mini PlatformCute and CozyGetty ImagesHeels? No, thank you. Uggs with a lift? Yes, please! Give yourself a boost with a pair of Uggs that have an extra platform. Dress them down for a football game or up for a day of holiday shopping.Chloé Gold Carlina SunglassesEterne Butter Rib Cropped Fitted Turtleneck TopFree People CRVY Gia Wide-Leg JeansUgg Classic Short New HeightsDior Mini Lady Dior BagAstrid & Miyu Dome Huggies in GoldNow 26% OffElevated Comfort Getty ImagesBeing comfortable doesn’t always have to equate to wearing sweatpants and a hoodie. Dress up your loungewear look with a cozy cashmere set that will keep you as warm as your favorite blanket. You’ll stay incredibly snug while remaining stylish. It’s a win-win in my book. A bright piece of outerwear like this is sure to boost your mood on a rainy day, and paired with a color-block sweater, it really solidifies the look. Make it more weather-appropriate by adding a cinched jacket and a pair of tall Uggs to make for a warmer, cozier approach. And in case you need another layer, might I suggest a pair of burgundy tights?Celine 52MM Oval Acetate SunglassesAritzia Cozy Fleece Snug Hi-Rib Zip HoodieNow 20% OffLisa Says Gah Maeve Midi SkirtUgg Classic Mini Dipper Cozy Ankle BootsMiu Miu Leather hobo bagGabriel & Co. 14K Yellow Plain Gold Diamond Cut Stackable Ring Streetwear ReadyGetty ImagesDistressed denim was seen all over the runways last season and it’s clear that this trend is here to stay for a while. I particularly like this style when it is in more of a baggy silhouette, which gives off that effortless, cool-girl vibe. It’s the perfect way to give your Uggs a streetwear-ready touch.Modern Citizen Halle Vegan Leather JacketMeshki Aurelie Cut Out Short Sleeve TopJaded London Acid Brown Colossus JeansNow 12% OffTory Burch Kira Diamond Quilt Convertible Shoulder BagUgg Classic Ultra Mini Platform BootRumored Endless Love HoopsEverything but The Suitcase Getty ImagesNow that the holidays are here, the time has come to build our stylish airport outfits. We’ve all had those work weeks where we made poor footwear choices for the daily commute and just needed something that wouldn’t add to the aches. Her latest collection has inspired many to think above and beyond and get creative with their aesthetic. Start with a skirt and sweater base layer, then build from there. html:
The holidays are right around the corner, which means it’s time to pull out of your favorite sherpa-lined Ugg boots. These iconic shoes took over in the 2000s and made the ultimate comeback just a few years ago, in 2022, with the release of the Bella Hadid-approved Classic Ultra Mini Platform (which just so happens to be my favorite, too).

Yes, Ugg boots are known for their undeniable comfort, but can we talk about how cute they are, too? The silhouette makes them the perfect winter boot, keeping you cozy no matter what the elements bring. And with so many styles and colors to choose from, there’s no need to stop at just one pair—from boho ensembles to chic airport looks, the outfit possibilities are limitless. Not quite sure what I mean? I found 14 outstandingly chic (and incredibly wearable) looks from street style stars and celebrities, including Bella and Gigi Hadid, Jennifer Lopez, Emily Ratajkowski, and Selena Gomez, to provide you with ample Ugg boots outfit inspiration for your next cold-weather look. See and shop them all below.

Trendsetting Basics

Running out of the house in your loungewear doesn’t have to be basic. (Of course, when it’s Bella Hadid wearing a look, it’s anything but basic, but I digress...) Whether you’re opting for the no-pants look or not, throw on your favorite sunnies, a leather jacket, and platform Uggs for a more stylish take on grabbing a sweet treat from the bodega or your favorite cafe. After all, iced lattes always taste better when you’re wearing a cute outfit.

Prada Black Runway Sunglasses

Now 10% Off

Free People Vinny Vegan Bomber

Skims Shrunken T-Shirt

Alo Yoga Icon Ribbed Boyshort

Now 32% Off

Alo Yoga Unisex Scrunch Sock

Now 32% Off

Ugg Classic Ultra Mini Platform Boot

Sherpa Season

This is one of my favorite times of the year—when you can feel wrapped up but not overly so. A vest is the perfect option for this weather, and in shearling? Sign me up. Pair it was a classic pair of jeans and a patent leather bag à la Gigi Hadid, and you’re all set for just about anything.

Gucci Oval-shaped Sunglasses

Isabel Marant Gwendalia Wool-Blend Vest

Now 30% Off

Ralph Lauren Relaxed Fit Striped Cotton Shirt

Now 16% Off

Levi’s Ribcage Full Length

Ugg Tazz Platform Slipper

Versace Croc-Effect Medusa ’95 Small Handbag

Cheetah Girl

In my opinion, animal prints like leopard and cheetah prints are a sartorial neutral. I own this exact pair of pants and can confidently say they’re part of my weekly rotation. The beauty of these is that you don’t need much else to make them look chic. Add an oversized bomber jacket, sunnies, and, of course, your favorite style of Uggs, and you have yourself a cute and comfortable fall ’fit.

Otra Quinn Sunglasses

Acne Studios Bomber Jacket

Courrèges Black Holistic Tank Top

Grey Bandit Tyler Pants

Vivienne Westwood Large Hazel Handbag

Ugg Classic Ultra Mini Platform

Cute and Cozy

Heels? No, thank you. Uggs with a lift? Yes, please! Give yourself a boost with a pair of Uggs that have an extra platform. Dress them down for a football game or up for a day of holiday shopping.

Chloé Gold Carlina Sunglasses

Eterne Butter Rib Cropped Fitted Turtleneck Top

Free People CRVY Gia Wide-Leg Jeans

Ugg Classic Short New Heights

Dior Mini Lady Dior Bag

Astrid & Miyu Dome Huggies in Gold

Now 26% Off

Elevated Comfort

Being comfortable doesn’t always have to equate to wearing sweatpants and a hoodie. Dress up your loungewear look with a cozy cashmere set that will keep you as warm as your favorite blanket.

Balenciaga Black Wrap D-Frame Sunglasses

Now 21% Off

Vince Oversized Double Knit Cardigan

Naked Cashmere Gina Midi Skirt

St. Agni Soft Arc Bag

HUE Mini Crew Sock 6-Pack

Ugg Classic Ultra Mini Platform Boot

Chic Athleisure

Whether you’re running to a workout class or just wanting to feel relaxed, try upgrading your athleisure ensembles with a wool wrap coat, leather gloves, and Uggs. You’ll stay incredibly snug while remaining stylish. It’s a win-win in my book.

Everlane The Cloud Oversized Turtleneck

Now 30% Off

Alo Yoga 7/8 High-Waist Airbrush Legging

Now 31% Off

Michael Kors Wool Blend Wrap Coat

Coach Sculpted Signature Leather Tech Gloves

Ugg Bailey Button II Boot

Now 29% Off

Astrid & Miyu Essential Dome Ring

Now 25% Off

Bright Trench

I normally turn to shades of black and white for the winter months, but I can’t get over how cute this yellow trench is. A bright piece of outerwear like this is sure to boost your mood on a rainy day, and paired with a color-block sweater, it really solidifies the look.

Chimi 09 Brown

Norba Trench Coat Electra

Saodimallsu Womens Striped Cropped Sweater

Agolde Low Slung Baggy 30.5”

Kate Spade Dakota Small Crossbody

Ugg Disquette

Skirt Season

I am a sucker for a midi skirt—even in the colder months. Make it more weather-appropriate by adding a cinched jacket and a pair of tall Uggs to make for a warmer, cozier approach. And in case you need another layer, might I suggest a pair of burgundy tights?

Celine 52MM Oval Acetate Sunglasses

Aritzia Cozy Fleece Snug Hi-Rib Zip Hoodie

Now 20% Off

Lisa Says Gah Maeve Midi Skirt

Ugg Classic Mini Dipper Cozy Ankle Boots

Miu Miu Leather hobo bag

Gabriel & Co. 14K Yellow Plain Gold Diamond Cut Stackable Ring

Streetwear Ready

Distressed denim was seen all over the runways last season and it’s clear that this trend is here to stay for a while. I particularly like this style when it is in more of a baggy silhouette, which gives off that effortless, cool-girl vibe. It’s the perfect way to give your Uggs a streetwear-ready touch.

Modern Citizen Halle Vegan Leather Jacket

Meshki Aurelie Cut Out Short Sleeve Top

Jaded London Acid Brown Colossus Jeans

Now 12% Off

Tory Burch Kira Diamond Quilt Convertible Shoulder Bag

Ugg Classic Ultra Mini Platform Boot

Rumored Endless Love Hoops

Everything but The Suitcase

Now that the holidays are here, the time has come to build our stylish airport outfits. Enhance your airport look with a pop of color–if it won’t fit in your suitcase, wear it instead. Layering adds a unique flair to your look while balancing versatility, so why not give it a try?

Coach C Hardware Round Sunglasses

Marni Yellow Brushed Alpaca Scarf with Fringes

The Frankie Shop Black Astra Bomber Jacket

Naked Wardrobe French Cotton-Terry Oversized Hoodie

Skims Boyfriend Loose Wide-Leg Pants

Ugg Tasman Slipper

The Mini Skirt

If it isn’t too cold outside, why not show a little leg? Bubble skirts are my new go-to wardrobe staple, and they’re so easy to style and look chic—regardless if it’s dressed up or down. Grab your favorite button-down and throw a warm knit on top. Trust me, double collars are in.

Frame Relaxed Cotton Shirt in Light Blue

Now 35% Off

Citizens of Humanity Simone Polo Sweater

Grey Lab Bubble Hem Scuba Drawstring Miniskirt

Now 30% Off

Ugg Classic Twin Seam New Heights Boots

Vince Vince Double Layer Wool & Cashmere Sweater

Now 25% Off

Frank & Eileen Patrick Popover Henley

Business Casual

Who said Uggs can’t be part of your workwear? We’ve all had those work weeks where we made poor footwear choices for the daily commute and just needed something that wouldn’t add to the aches. So why not try a pair of platform Tazmans with your best blazer and trousers? Keep it professional without sacrificing your comfort.

Le Specs Unreal 52mm Rectangular Sunglasses

Now 20% Off

Gabriel and Co 14K Yellow Gold Open Circle Pendant Necklace

Banana Republic Barathea Relaxed Italian Wool Tuxedo Jacket

Banana Republic Barathea Italian Wool Tapered Tuxedo Pant

Leatherology Greta Chain Small Pochette

Ugg Tazz Platform Slipper

Layered Look

If you didn’t know, layering is key for this season, and we have Miuccia Prada to thank for that. Her latest collection has inspired many to think above and beyond and get creative with their aesthetic. Start with a skirt and sweater base layer, then build from there. The world is your oyster.

Nili Lotan Blaise Parka

J.Crew Oval Buckle Belt in Italian Leather

Now 30% Off

LoveShackFancy Donna Skirt

Intimissimi Wool & Cotton Long Sleeve High Collar Top

Prada Buckle Large Leather Handbag with Belt

Ugg Classic Chillapeak Tall Boot

Chunky Scarf

A chunky scarf is the best accessory to enhance warmth and style during the colder months. Pair it with your favorite trench and trousers for an effortless, yet cozy look.

Grey Bandit Meadows Scarf

Proenza Schouler Faux Leather Trench Coat

Now 70% Off

Quince Mongolian Cashmere Crewneck Sweater

Reformation Alex Mid Rise Pant

Ugg Ultra Mini Classic Boot

Astird & Miyu Bold Pavé Huggies

Now 26% Off
